channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solid by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 18:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solid by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:16 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community

item.title: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291

A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291#Kupyansky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
